TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed EmailPosition extends System.Enum

summary.span: Define la posición donde se ha encontrado una entidad extraída en un mensaje.

span.span: Defines the position where an extracted entity was found in a message.

summary.span: El clase es aplicable para los clientes que estén destinados a Exchange Online y versiones de Exchange a partir de Exchange Server 2013.

span.span: The class is applicable for clients that target Exchange Online and versions of Exchange starting with Exchange Server 2013.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Microsoft.Exchange.WebServices.Data.EmailPosition LatestReply = int32(0)

summary.span: Los puntos de posición para la respuesta más reciente.

span.span: The position points to the latest reply.

summary.span: El campo LatestReply es aplicable para los clientes que estén destinados a Exchange Online y versiones de Exchange a partir de Exchange Server 2013.

span.span: The LatestReply field is applicable for clients that target Exchange Online and versions of Exchange starting with Exchange Server 2013.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Microsoft.Exchange.WebServices.Data.EmailPosition Other = int32(1)

summary.span: La posición apunta a una posición en la lista.

span.span: The position points to an unlisted position.

summary.span: El otro campo es aplicable para los clientes que estén destinados a Exchange Online y versiones de Exchange a partir de Exchange Server 2013.

span.span: The Other field is applicable for clients that target Exchange Online and versions of Exchange starting with Exchange Server 2013.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Microsoft.Exchange.WebServices.Data.EmailPosition Signature = int32(3)

summary.span: Los puntos de posición para la firma de un correo electrónico.

span.span: The position points to the signature of an email.

summary.span: El campo de firma es aplicable para los clientes que estén destinados a Exchange Online y versiones de Exchange a partir de Exchange Server 2013.

span.span: The Signature field is applicable for clients that target Exchange Online and versions of Exchange starting with Exchange Server 2013.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Microsoft.Exchange.WebServices.Data.EmailPosition Subject = int32(2)

summary.span: Los puntos de posición para el asunto de un correo electrónico.

span.span: The position points to the subject of an email.

summary.span: El campo asunto es aplicable para los clientes que estén destinados a Exchange Online y versiones de Exchange a partir de Exchange Server 2013.

span.span: The Subject field is applicable for clients that target Exchange Online and versions of Exchange starting with Exchange Server 2013.
